InstructionData.Title: HP - Hazard Protection
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# HP - Hazard Protection # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias VentIn d1
define SETPOINT 105 define TOXIC 0.5 #kpa
#alias lowtarget r1 #alias hightarget r2 #alias ventinsetting r3 #alias ventoutsetting r4 #alias ventinsetpoint r5 #alias ventoutsetpoint r6 alias pp r7 #alias ventoutact r8 alias pressure r9 #alias presok r11 # pressure OK alias hazard r10 alias error r11 alias cv r12 alias temp1 r13 alias temp2 r14
init: #j stop2 #sub lowtarget SETPOINT DIFF #add hightarget SETPOINT DIFF
s VentIn Lock 0 #s VentIn Mode 1 s VentIn On 0 #s VentOut Lock 0 #s VentOut Mode 1 #s VentOut On 1
#move ventinsetting lowtarget #move ventoutsetting hightarget
loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure jal checkhazard beqz hazard off
#sge presok pressure ventinsetting #select ventinsetting presok lowtarget SETPOINT
#sle presok pressure ventoutsetting #select ventoutsetting presok hightarget SETPOINT
setvent: sub error SETPOINT pressure mul error 100 error add cv error SETPOINT s VentIn PressureExternal 0 s VentIn PressureInternal cv s VentIn Mode 1 s VentIn On 1
#s VentOut PressureExternal ventoutsetting #s VentOut PressureInternal 40000
#move temp1 ventinsetting #round temp1 temp1 #mul temp1 temp1 100000 #add temp1 temp1 ventoutsetting #round temp1 temp1 s db Setting pp #s db Setting 2 yield j loop
checkhazard: l temp1 GasSensor RatioVolatiles l temp2 GasSensor RatioPollutant add temp1 temp1 temp2 # volatiles + pollutant mul pp temp1 pressure # toxins * pressure sge hazard pp TOXIC j ra
#hazard: #mul ventinsetting hightarget 1.025 #mul ventoutsetting lowtarget 0.975 #j setvent
off: s VentIn On 0 s db On 0 j loop
stop2:
